other Arts and Social  
Science subjects  
  
  
   (ii) Candidates with no previous knowledge of the 
Language may be admitted.  
(iii) IBADAN accepts ‘O' level credit passes in 
Literature in English and other Arts and Social 
Science subjects.  
(iv) LAGOS requires English Language, Mathematics, 
and three (3) other Arts or S ocial Science 
subjects. Civic Education and Computer Studies 
are also accepted.  
(v) OAU – ‘O’ levelcredit pass in German is not 
compulsory.  
(vi) UNN requires 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language and four (4) other subjects. History or 
LiteratureinEnglish will be an advantage.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) IBADAN requires Literature in English plus one 
(1)Arts subject and any other Arts or Social 
Science subject.  
(ii) LAGOS requires Literature in English and any 
other three (3) subjects from Arts or Social 
Sciences.  
(iii) UNN requires English Language and any other 
three (3) subjects.  
   
LINGUISTICS  
AAUA           
ABUAD  
ABUJA                    
BAYERO  
BSU  
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
or NCE to include any 
Language, preferably 
an African Language.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
including English Language.  
  
Any Language and 
two (2) other 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) AAUA accepts NCE credit/Merit in Yoruba, Mass 
Communication and Journalism.  
(ii) BSU accepts two (2) NCE/ ‘A’ level passes to 
include English Language, French or any African 
Language and one (1) other Arts subjects.  
 
REQUIREMENTS
